member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ActorType
member.summary: Enum for selecting the target type of actor.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ActorType.Undefined
member.summary: Intended for either Users or Groups.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ActorType.User
member.summary: Intended for just Users.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ActorType.Group
member.summary: Intended for just Groups.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ComparisonType
member.summary: Enum for selecting target comparison between current value and target value.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ComparisonType.Equals
member.summary: Current and target are equal in value.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ComparisonType.NotEqual
member.summary: Current and target are not equal in value.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ComparisonType.Greater
member.summary: Current is greater in value than the target.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ComparisonType.GreaterOrEqual
member.summary: Current is greater than or equal to the value of the target.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ComparisonType.Less
member.summary: Current is less than the value of the target.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ComparisonType.LessOrEqual
member.summary: Current is less than or equal to the value of the target.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.CriteriaQueryType
member.summary: Enum for selecting what values will be used to query if criteria is met.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.CriteriaQueryType.Any
member.summary: Check if any singular piece of GameData matches the criteria.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.CriteriaQueryType.Sum
member.summary: Check if a sum of all GameData for that key matches the crteria (Long and Float only).

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.CriteriaQueryType.Latest
member.summary: Check if the most recent piece of GameData matches the criteria.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.CriteriaScope
member.summary: Enum for selecting if GameData is to checked against just the actor in question or other actors relating to them (i.e. group members)

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.CriteriaScope.Actor
member.summary: Test the criteria against the specified actor

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.CriteriaScope.RelatedActors
member.summary: Test the criteria against the specified actors relations ie. a users friends, or a groups members

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationCriteria
member.summary: Encapsulates requirements for completing an achievement or skill.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationCriteria.Key
member.summary: The key which will be queried against to check if criteria is met.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationCriteria.DataType
member.summary: GameDataType of the key which is being queried.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationCriteria.CriteriaQueryType
member.summary: Which stored GameData will be queried.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationCriteria.ComparisonType
member.summary: How the target value and the actual value will be compared.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationCriteria.Scope
member.summary: Whether the criteria will be checked against the actor or related actors (i.e. group members, user friends).

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationCriteria.Value
member.summary: The value which will compared against in order to see if the criteria has been met.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationType
member.summary: Enum for selecting the category of evaluation being stored or looked for.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationType.Achievement
member.summary: Achievement evaluation type

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationType.Skill
member.summary: Skill evaluation type

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.GameDataType
member.summary: Enum for selecting the type of data being stored or looked for.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.GameDataType.String
member.summary: A non-numeric set of characters.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.GameDataType.Long
member.summary: Numeric value with no decimal places.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.GameDataType.Float
member.summary: Numeric value with decimal places.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.GameDataType.Boolean
member.summary: True or false.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardFilterType
member.summary: Enum for selecting subsection of users for current standings of a leaderboard.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardFilterType.Top
member.summary: Provides standings based off the global ranking of the leaderboard.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardFilterType.Near
member.summary: Provides standings in relation to the actorId provided.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardFilterType.Friends
member.summary: Provides only the standings of those who are friends of the actorId provided.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardFilterType.GroupMembers
member.summary: Provides only the standings of those who are members of the actorId provided.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardType
member.summary: Enum for selecting the type and sorting order of the leaderboard being created.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardType.Highest
member.summary: Sort by the highest GameData values for a key. Only the highest is taken for each Actor.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardType.Lowest
member.summary: Sort by the lowest GameData values for a key. Only the lowest is taken for each Actor.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardType.Cumulative
member.summary: Sort by the highest sum of GameData values for a key for an actor.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardType.Count
member.summary: Sort by the highest count of a GameData key for an actor.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardType.Earliest
member.summary: Sort by the earliest occurence of a GameData key. Only the earliest 'DateCreation' is taken for each Actor.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardType.Latest
member.summary: Sort by the most recent occurence of a GameData key. Only the most recent 'DateModified' is taken for each Actor.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.Reward
member.summary: Encapsulates the reward given for completing an achievement or skill.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.Reward.Key
member.summary: The key which will be stored in GameData.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.Reward.DataType
member.summary: GameDataType of the value for this GameData.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.Reward.Value
member.summary: The value of the GameData.
